```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

colors<-c(
  "#e6e0d0", #1 background
  "#c04631", #2 red
  "#7aa03e", #3 green
  "#2a4c7e", #4 blue
  "#3d362f", #5 charcoal
  "#b9b064"  #6 greenish yellowish big curve
)

g<-ggplot()+ theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill=colors[1], colour='white'),
                   panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
                   panel.grid.minor = element_blank())

```


make first curve?
```{r}

bound<-pi/3
big.curve<-data.frame(
  y<-sin(seq(bound, -bound, length=500)),
  x<-cos(seq(bound, -bound, length=500))
)

g<-g+
  #big curve
  geom_line(data=big.curve, 
               aes(x=x, y=y), 
               colour=colors[6])
g
```
